info.name: Swanytello RAG API
info.description:
RAG endpoints for Swanytello.

**Auth:** POST /api/rag/test and POST /api/rag/chat require JWT when AUTH_STATUS=on.
- **Option A (local dev):** Set AUTH_STATUS=off in .env and restart the server â€” then you can leave the Authorization header empty.
- **Option B:** Set the collection variable `token` to a valid JWT (e.g. from scripts/dev-token.js) and use Authorization: Bearer {{token}}.

request.description: RAG/LLM reachability (Ollama or OpenAI). No auth. If this returns 200, POST RAG endpoints should work if auth is satisfied.

Chat with JSON body only. Requires JWT unless AUTH_STATUS=off.

- Enable the Authorization header and set {{token}} when AUTH_STATUS=on.
- When AUTH_STATUS=off, leave Authorization disabled or delete the header.
